name: Work Shenanigans
description:
7 November  2022, 20:00 SAST for 72 hour entries.

Stuck in the lower levels, Brenda begrudgingly completes her company tasks. During downtime, she is secretly placing droids into pipes and piloting them using unauthorized software. 

But to what end...?

3rd Year Students at Vega School, Cape Town
